entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
